trans-unit.source: TypoScript Configuration: Disable autoloading of constants and setup
Link: The url/page uid of your cookie policy. If it’s unset, the link is hidden.
Theme: The theme you wish to use. Options: dark-top/dark-floating/dark-bottom/light-top/light-floating/light-bottom oder URL to a CSS file. Leave empty to use your own CSS files.
CSS Selector: The element you want the Cookie Consent notification to be appended to.
Path: The path for the consent cookie to remember that users have consented to cookies.
Domain: The domain for the consent cookie to remember that users have consented to cookies.
Days: The number of days to remember the user’s consent information for.
